name: Combine (Typhoeus)
description:
Try to combine colors and pass the level!

Left mouse button for pulling balls.

Right mouse button for droping .

You must pull the colors and drop it them to the well.

But right colors.

Every level we have a Destination color on the signboard.Must look at it.

And combine true colors to pass level.

Like if Destination color is purple,you should drop blue and red cube.

BACKGROUND MUSIC-DARKENED SYNTHWAVE-Looperman,SMOKLEY

Enjoy!
